name: i_qualify_management_api
description: The iQualify API offers management responses for building learning experiences using your iQualify instance data.  Once youâ€™ve registered with iQualify, you can request an API access token by navigating to the API access section of the "Account Settings" area.  Find out how to [Request your API access token](https://www.iqualify.com/help/connecting-iqualify-to-other-systems/api/how-to-access-and-manage-your-api-token) on our Knowledge base.  All endpoints are only accessible via https and are located at api.iqualify.com. For instance: you can find your current offerings by accessing the following URL:      https://api.iqualify.com/v1/offerings/current
